Detailed Description

An abstract interface for an object that can load hierarchical data from a persistent medium (eg. to a disk file). The most common implementation is to load from an XML file, as in XMLLoader. This class loads data stored by a corresponding Storer class.

Since the structures being loaded are not strictly hierarchical, there is a facility for creating identifiers for objects that makes it possible to create references between objects from different hierarchies. When an object that that is being loaded sees that an ID has been stored for that object, it will register itself with the loader so that other objects can obtain a pointer to this object.
